name: Revenge of the Luchadorks
description:
You are Pablo ‘El Burrito’ Sanchez, a recently retired luchador. The announcement of his retirement, a mere two weeks ago, infuriated the federation of luchadores. “Nobody quits just like that esé!” And so the siege of Pablo’s humble tacohome begins…

For Ludum Dare 41 I teamed up with illustrator Mathijs Vissers to create a videogame in 72 hours (for the 2nd time). The theme for this edition was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". We decided to create a platformer/tower-defence game that takes place in Mexico.

I did the music and the programming, Mathijs did the art and animation.

(Sadly the leaderboard doesn't work on Itch.io. If you want to see your awesome highscore stacked against others, play the game here.)
